name: insomnia
text: Christ I hope it's not wrong to love Liv Tyler.

name: centipede_damascus
text: A comment left by centipede_damascus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, johnnybaverage, riotdejaneiro, lordatog, instantkarma, mortshire, Jhunter, Connellingus, Weretrout, NDCaesar, nutmeg, Wulvaine, jonnylatron, Doc_Rostov, holly_golightly, fortunagolde)

text: WHY FIND OUT?

name: lolsworth
text: If you are gay or something, maybe.

name: wazza
text: I think that gay guys can still love Liv Tyler

name: lolsworth
text: But not in the same way

name: crouchosarus
text: this comment had no chubbies.  unnaceptabble

name: lolsworth
text: I thought I'd chubbied it. I apologise for the overlook.

name: awko
text: If it's wrong to love Liv Tyler, I don't want to be right.

name: stuart
text: Not unless you're Steven Tyler.

name: honesttom
text: It's not wrong for a father to love his daughter.

name: tekende
text: It depends on the methodology used to do so.

name: bixschmix
text: For instance, putting her in skimpy clothes and having her dance sexily in your music video? Weird.

name: spinynorman
text:
Watching that video was a crucial part in becoming a man.

The real winner was watching Mary Poppins with my family. I used to do that all the time as a kid. Then when I was about thirteen or so I watched it and all of the sudden I was like, "...damn. Miss Poppins is bangin'! "

Then I punched a hole in the wall and pounded a tallboy.

These things happen instantaneously.

name: crankheart
text: just for the record...your comments make me laugh most. you win.

name: tripperday
text: I wish I could give two chubbies to that comment.

name: kennisiou
text:
Sometimes I will read one of his comments and want to chubby it several times, so I will find his comments on the next pages and read chubby them.

This would be wrong normally, but his comments on the next page are also normally chubby-worthy.

I...

I will never be able to truly give norman the number of chubbies he deserves.

name: soticoto
text:
Julie Andrews as Mary Poppins gave me my first erection.
I've always liked women who take control of the situation... and fly.

name: achilleselbow
text: What about putting pictures of her on the internet, dressed and such, with speech bubbles containing pictures of your murders?

name: dracer2
text:
If you were Stephen Tyler for one night, and you could basically have any woman you wanted, who would you choose?

Me? I'd choose Liv Tyler.

name: semiquaver
text: I never noticed that the first time i watched it.

name: kamet
text: it could NEVER be wrong to love Liv Tyler, man.

name: rayonatoilet
text: If loving Liv Tyler is wrong, then I am in a LOT OF TROUBLE.

text: Need that last shirt. NEED it.

all slamming down a chubby digit on the mouse to lame that comment

text: This was also my first. A link was sent to me because I wear a lot of shirts with ridiculous things written on them.

text: There's something that cracks me up about the way that Teodor flips the shirts around, arms all crossed and angry lookin'

name: sargasm
text: Is that last shirt a Death to the Extremist reference?  It extremely seems like it.

name: zem
text: how so

name: sargasm
text: The font is right, and Death to the Extremist often puts explanatory notes in parentheses after a sentence, like in this one. It's an outside chance, but it sure seems like it to me.

text: Heh that's pretty funny
